Claim: "A person is obscured in shadow in a gymnasium."
Implication: "The person is a vampire avoiding the sun."
Referring expressions: person, gymnasium, shadow  person, vampire, sun
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsObscuredInShadow(a) and IsInGymnasium(b))) & (forall f (forall g (  AvoidsSun(f) ->  IsObscuredInShadow(g))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsVampire(a) and AvoidsSun(d))))
